summary: TRUCK WAS TRAVELING AT APPROX 70 TO 75 MPH AND SLID CAUSING LOST CONTROLS.  AS TRUCK HIT HEAD ON INTO EMBANKMENT AND ROLLED AT LEAST ONCE.  NEITHER AIRBAG DEPLOYED.  THIS IS A VERY SORROWFUL EVENT FOR ANYONE AND COULD CAUSE PROBLEMS FOR OTHERS IN SUCH SITUATIONS.  PLEASE CONTACT EVERYONE AND LET THEM KNOW OF THIS TYPE OF INCIDENT.   *NLM
